verses.verse: I am inquired <S%H1875><s%> of by them that asked <S%H7592><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> for me <S%H4672><s%>; I am found of them that sought <S%H1245><s%> me not <S%H3808><s%>: I said <S%H559><s%>, Behold me <S%H1471><s%>, behold me, unto a nation that was not called <S%H7121><s%> by my name <S%H8034><s%>.

I have spread out <S%H6566><s%> my hands <S%H3027><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%> unto a rebellious <S%H5637><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, that walk <S%H1980><s%> in a way <S%H1870><s%> that is not good <S%H2896><s%>, after <S%H310><s%> their own thoughts <S%H4284><s%>;

a people <S%H5971><s%> that provoke <S%H3707><s%> me to my face <S%H6440><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>, sacrificing <S%H2076><s%> in gardens <S%H1593><s%>, and burning incense <S%H6999><s%> upon bricks <S%H3843><s%>;

that sit <S%H3427><s%> among the graves <S%H6913><s%>, and lodge <S%H3885><s%> in the secret places <S%H5341><s%>; that eat <S%H398><s%> swine <S%H2386><s%>'s flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and broth <S%H4839><s%> of abominable <S%H6292><s%> things is in their vessels <S%H3627><s%>;

that say <S%H559><s%>, Stand <S%H7126><s%> by thyself <S%H5066><s%>, come not near to me <S%H6942><s%>, for I am holier than thou <S%H6227><s%>. These are a smoke in my nose <S%H639><s%>, a fire <S%H784><s%> that burneth <S%H3344><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%>.

Behold <S%H3789><s%>, it is written before <S%H6440><s%> me <S%H2814><s%>: I will not keep silence, but will recompense <S%H7999><s%>, yea <S%H7999><s%>, I will recompense into their bosom <S%H2436><s%>,

your own iniquities <S%H5771><s%>, and the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that have burned incense <S%H6999><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and blasphemed <S%H2778><s%> me upon the hills <S%H1389><s%>; therefore will I first <S%H7223><s%> measure <S%H4058><s%> their work <S%H6468><s%> into their bosom <S%H2436><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, As the new wine <S%H8492><s%> is found <S%H4672><s%> in the cluster <S%H811><s%>, and one saith <S%H559><s%>, Destroy <S%H7843><s%> it not <S%H1293><s%>, for a blessing is in it <S%H6213><s%>: so will I do for my servants <S%H5650><s%>' sake <S%H7843><s%>, that I may not destroy them all.

And I will bring forth <S%H3318><s%> a seed <S%H2233><s%> out of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and out of Judah <S%H3063><s%> an inheritor <S%H3423><s%> of my mountains <S%H2022><s%>; and my chosen <S%H972><s%> shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H5650><s%>, and my servants shall dwell there <S%H7931><s%>.

And Sharon <S%H8289><s%> shall be a fold <S%H5116><s%> of flocks <S%H6629><s%>, and the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Achor <S%H5911><s%> a place for herds <S%H1241><s%> to lie down in <S%H7258><s%>, for my people <S%H5971><s%> that have sought me <S%H1875><s%>.

But ye that forsake <S%H5800><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that forget <S%H7913><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>, that prepare <S%H6186><s%> a table <S%H7979><s%> for Fortune <S%H1409><s%>, and that fill <S%H4390><s%> up mingled wine <S%H4469><s%> unto Destiny <S%H4507><s%>;

I will destine <S%H4487><s%> you to the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and ye shall all bow down <S%H3766><s%> to the slaughter <S%H2874><s%>; because when I called <S%H7121><s%>, ye did not answer <S%H6030><s%>; when I spake <S%H1696><s%>, ye did not hear <S%H8085><s%>; but ye did <S%H6213><s%> that which was evil <S%H7451><s%> in mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and chose <S%H977><s%> that wherein I delighted not <S%H2654><s%>.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, Behold <S%H5650><s%>, my servants shall eat <S%H398><s%>, but ye shall be hungry <S%H7456><s%>; behold <S%H5650><s%>, my servants shall drink <S%H8354><s%>, but ye shall be thirsty <S%H6770><s%>; behold <S%H5650><s%>, my servants shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%>, but ye shall be put to shame <S%H954><s%>;

behold <S%H5650><s%>, my servants shall sing <S%H7442><s%> for joy <S%H2898><s%> of heart <S%H3820><s%>, but ye shall cry <S%H6817><s%> for sorrow <S%H3511><s%> of heart <S%H3820><s%>, and shall wail <S%H3213><s%> for vexation <S%H7667><s%> of spirit <S%H7307><s%>.

And ye shall leave <S%H3240><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> for a curse <S%H7621><s%> unto my chosen <S%H972><s%>; and the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%> will slay <S%H4191><s%> thee <S%H7121><s%>; and he will call his servants <S%H5650><s%> by another <S%H312><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>:

so that he who blesseth <S%H1288><s%> himself in the earth <S%H776><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%> himself in the God <S%H430><s%> of truth <S%H543><s%>; and he that sweareth <S%H7650><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%> shall swear <S%H7650><s%> by the God <S%H430><s%> of truth <S%H543><s%>; because the former <S%H7223><s%> troubles <S%H6869><s%> are forgotten <S%H7911><s%>, and because they are hid <S%H5641><s%> from mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

For <S%H1254><s%>, behold, I create new <S%H2319><s%> heavens <S%H8064><s%> and a new <S%H2319><s%> earth <S%H776><s%>; and the former <S%H7223><s%> things shall not be remembered <S%H2142><s%>, nor come <S%H5927><s%> into mind <S%H3820><s%>.

But be ye glad <S%H7797><s%> and rejoice <S%H1523><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%> in that which I create <S%H1254><s%>; for <S%H1254><s%>, behold, I create Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> a rejoicing <S%H1525><s%>, and her people <S%H5971><s%> a joy <S%H4885><s%>.

And I will rejoice <S%H1523><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and joy <S%H7797><s%> in my people <S%H5971><s%>; and there shall be heard <S%H8085><s%> in her no more the voice <S%H6963><s%> of weeping <S%H1065><s%> and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of crying <S%H2201><s%>.

There shall be no more thence an infant <S%H5764><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%>, nor an old man <S%H2205><s%> that hath not filled <S%H4390><s%> his days <S%H3117><s%>; for the child <S%H5288><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, and the sinner <S%H2398><s%> being a hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> shall be accursed <S%H7043><s%>.

And they shall build <S%H1129><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%>, and inhabit <S%H3427><s%> them <S%H5193><s%>; and they shall plant vineyards <S%H3754><s%>, and eat <S%H398><s%> the fruit of them <S%H6529><s%>.

They shall not build <S%H1129><s%>, and another <S%H312><s%> inhabit <S%H3427><s%>; they shall not plant <S%H5193><s%>, and another <S%H312><s%> eat <S%H398><s%>: for as the days <S%H3117><s%> of a tree <S%H6086><s%> shall be the days <S%H3117><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>, and my chosen <S%H972><s%> shall long enjoy <S%H1086><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of their hands <S%H3027><s%>.

They shall not labor <S%H3021><s%> in vain <S%H7385><s%>, nor bring forth <S%H3205><s%> for calamity <S%H928><s%>; for they are the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the blessed <S%H1288><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and their offspring with them <S%H6631><s%>.
And it shall come to pass that <S%H7121><s%>, before they call, I will answer <S%H6030><s%>; and while they are yet speaking <S%H1696><s%>, I will hear <S%H8085><s%>.

The wolf <S%H2061><s%> and the lamb <S%H2924><s%> shall feed <S%H7462><s%> together <S%H259><s%>, and the lion <S%H738><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> like the ox <S%H1241><s%>; and dust <S%H6083><s%> shall be the serpent <S%H5175><s%>'s food <S%H3899><s%>. They shall not hurt <S%H7489><s%> nor destroy <S%H7843><s%> in all my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
